channel.title: Need someone to portfoward my 718 RSPS!
channel.description:
Hey,
Basically i need someone to portfoward my computer because i'm sitting here like :confused: :confused: :confused: so if you can Add me on skype: scottylumber
Cheers, Scotty

item.title: Need someone to portfoward my 718 RSPS!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

PvPXile:

Good luck port forwarding a computer. Also, you can’t offer rewards.

It’s easy to port-forward a computer, however, you’re technically not port-forwarding your computer but rather your router to an IPv4 address that’s linked to your computer. Also to, ‘emptyone999’ port-forwarding through uTorrent is completely useless and shitty. Better, and more correct way to port-forward (for a more secure connection)…

  1. Go to Start > Run > cmd
  2. Type ipconfig and press enter, then take note of the IPv4 address listed.
  3. Open a web browser and in the URL box type, “192.168.1.1” if that doesn’t work try “192.168.0.1”.
  4. Log in to your router, generally the username is ‘admin’ and the password is either ‘admin’ or ‘password’.
  5. Route yourself to the port-forwarding section of your routers settings.
  6. The service name can be whatever you want, set the port to 43594, check TCP and UDP, and put in your IPv4 address listed from before.
  7. Save the settings and sometimes you’ll need to enable the port-forwarding, usually by ticking a small box next to the newly created entry.
  8. Do not get no-ip as it’s pretty much pointless and creates an extra step in the connection.
  9. Go to http://whatsmyip.org and take note of your IP address, this is the IP people will use to connect.

And you’re done, don’t use uTorrent or No-IP.

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to portfoward my 718 RSPS!

item.title: Need someone to portfoward my 718 RSPS!
item.dc:creator: @emptyone999 emptyone999
item.description:
@emptyone999 wrote:

Hi, i can portfoward with Utorrent bud.
Download utorrent. http://www.utorrent.com/utorrent-free
Open it And go to edit>preferences>connections>change the random port to 43594.
don’t change anything else. click ok, close it, it will minimize to tray.

go to canyouseeme.org enter port 43594 and see if it worked
and then go to http://www.runelocus.com/tools/statuschecker.html and put your ip address and see if its online. And if you can’t log in upload the client and then change the ip to 0.0.0.0 for you only others your (no-ip) or ip
and close utorrent and when you log in click it again. and your done

My RSN or runescape name is: Emptyone99
P.M when i will get my reward

Read full topic
